Detailed Description

The CallWaitingHandler is a SS handler responsible for modifying the Call Waiting SS. This includes activating and deactivating the service as well as interrogating the current status. The handler provides various methods for these purposes.

Member Enumeration Documentation

Enumerator defining the handler's identifier.

Member Function Documentation

SsApiRc CallWaitingHandler::Activate (  ServiceGroup  basic_service = AllServices,
const WString &  override_ss_seq = L"",
BOOLEAN  register_only = FALSE,
LineSelector  line = InvalidLine
) 
 

Activates call waiting.
Activates the call waiting service and optionally for a specific basic service group.
This method triggers sending of *43*<basic_service># to the mobile network. The transaction is initiated using the main handler and the resulting tipd is stored along with the parameters.

Parameters:
basic_service The basic service group of the request (all services, all teleservices, etc.), defaults to all services.
override_ss_seq Supplementary Service request string to be sent to net, overrides handler generated request string.
register_only A flag that indicates if the request is sent to the GSM stack or only registered at SsMainHandler.
Returns:
Any value SsMainHandler::BeginTransaction might return.
See also:
SsMainHandler

const WString &  override_ss_seq = L"",
BOOLEAN  register_only = FALSE,

Deactivates call waiting.
Deactivates the call waiting service and optionally for a specific basic service group.
This method triggers sending of #43*<basic_service># to the mobile network. The transaction is initiated using the main handler and the resulting tipd is stored along with the parameters.

Parameters:
basic_service The basic service group of the request (all services, all teleservices, etc.), defaults to all services.
override_ss_seq Supplementary Service request string to be sent to net, overrides handler generated request string.
register_only A flag that indicates if the request is sent to the GSM stack or only registered at SsMainHandler.

SsApiRc CallWaitingHandler::RequestStatus (  const WString &  override_ss_seq = L"",
BOOLEAN  register_only = FALSE,
LineSelector  line = InvalidLine
) 
 

Interrogates the call waiting status.
This method triggers sending of *#43# to the mobile network. The transaction is initiated using the main handler and the resulting tipd is stored.

THIS METHOD IS DEPRECATED. Use Request Status with basic service instead.

Parameters:
override_ss_seq Supplementary Service request string to be sent to net, overrides handler generated request string.
register_only A flag that indicates if the request is sent to the GSM stack or only registered at SsMainHandler.
Returns:
Any value SsMainHandler::BeginTransaction might return.
See also:
SsMainHandler
